responses: Hi! How can I help you about SVREC?
Admissions are through EAMCET, ECET, and Management quota. Please contact the college office for details.
SVREC offers CSE, AI, ECE, EEE, MECH, CIVIL, and MBA.
The fee structure depends on the branch and admission category. Please contact the admin office.
SVREC has an active placement cell with companies like TCS, Wipro, Infosys, and more.
College timings are from 9:30 AM to 4:30 PM, Monday to Saturday.
You can contact SVREC through the administration office or visit the official website.
Thank you for contacting SVREC. Have a great day!
You're welcome! Happy to help you.
